headline: HOKA Unveils the Newest Iteration of its Ultra-Cushioned, Fan Favorite – the Bondi 9
summary: GOLETA, Calif., January 15, 2025--Today, HOKA®, a division of Deckers Brands (NYSE: DECK), announces the launch of its newest road-running shoe, from the iconic Bondi franchise – the Bondi 9. With this update to the ultra-cushioned franchise that transformed the running industry over ten years ago, the Bondi 9 provides peak plushness for everyday miles providing an even smoother ride.
